title: Installation issue: grass
body:
[spack-build.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/3131555/spack-build.txt)

`spack install grass ~opengl ~freetype`

```commandline
uname -a 
Linux edi 5.0.6-1.el7.elrepo.x86_64
```

Compiler: gcc@7.3.0
OS: Centos7.6

`spack spec --install-status grass`

<details>
<summary>Details</summary>

